item.title: EP 54 - Super Soldier John Stormm
item.itunes:title: Super Soldier John Stormm
item.description:
Today we look, but don't touch, a deadly tree and then we explore the world of Super Soldiers with our guide, John Stormm.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

Do Not Eat, Touch, Or Even Inhale the Air Around the Manchineel Tree

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/whatever-you-do-do-not-eat-touch-or-even-inhale-the-air-around-the-manchineel-tree

Eating a manchineel “beach apple”

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1127797/

This Tree Is So Toxic, You Can't Stand Under It When It Rains

https://www.sciencealert.com/do-not-stand-under-world-s-most-dangerous-tree-manchineel-tree

Why manchineel might be Earth's most dangerous tree

https://www.mnn.com/family/protection-safety/blogs/why-manchineel-might-be-earths-most-dangerous-tree

White Snakeroot

https://adventure.howstuffworks.com/top-5-poisonous-plants4.htm

John Stormm Biography

https://supersoldierforum.ubbforum.com/topic/john-storm-biography?reply=581434538452747430#581434538452747430

Emergency Situation JOHN STORMM

http://supersoldiertalk.com/emergency-situation-john-stormm%C2%B7/

John Stormm - "Why Me?"

http://supersoldiertalk.com/john-stormm-why-me/

Jedi Finger Flick

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ntnq7edJVDU

CYA Pt. 2

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eWM1xZA-NOY

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
